it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn

Class TurnDataSourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn.TurnDataSourceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionDataSource, TurnDataSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScriptedDataSource

    public class TurnDataSourceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnDataSource
    An implementation of TurnDataSource This implementation allows for a player to be put on hold while other players interrupt their turn. Do note that this is not bound to any one turn, but may provide all the information that any turn requires to run its normal operations. It's possible that one TUrnDataSourceImplementation be used for multiple turns. This is evident in REVENGE actions, diring which a player's turn is interrupted by the revenger's wihout changing TurnDataSource.
